cause.description:
Former Presidents Jacques René Chirac and William Jefferson Clinton signed a treaty together to show their support for one another and one another's countries. Once George W. Bush came into office, he destroyed the relationship that the United States had with the most prosperous country in all of Europe.
1. The United States needs the support of the United Nations to stay a powerful country
2. Restoring peace between the two nations is one step closer to "giving peace a chance"
cause.mission: Restore relations between France and the United States
cause.name: Peace between France and USA
